campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
OBSBOT Me is our second Kickstarter campaign, after our first campaign we delivered over 5,000 units of our product to our customers across the world. Along the way, we built up tools, expertise, relationships, and experience that will help us to deliver OBSBOT Me to our backers. 

From a technology standpoint, much of the work that went into OBSBOT Tiny can be reused as a foundation for OBSBOT Me. Having that foundation means we can spend more time optimizing performance and testing features.

However, we understand there might still be some unexpected challenges in a well-prepared crowdfunding campaign, so we will make sure to send out updates whenever there is a slight change or issue. 

Please be aware that there may be extra customs fees due to the policy of different countries, and you will be responsible for customs fees, duties, VAT, import taxes, etc. administered by your government. They are excluded from the shipping fees. Normally, you won't be charged import duty taxes. However, given many different regulations in different countries, we can't guarantee that 100%. Our experienced logistic partner knows how to minimize customs taxes.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Here's a quick guide to all of our major updates since this Kickstarter began:
 MAY 7: 103% funded! NEW Final Goal: $6.3M and 2 NEW HOLIDAY SPECIALS!
MAY 7: $5.5M GOAL REACHED! 12 EPS and 12 NEW SHORTS!
 MAY 6: 89% funded. New Reward: Premiere Screening & Afterparty!
 MAY 5: 83% funded. New RiffTrax Rewards! Snowglobe + Mission Patches!
 MAY 4: $4.4M GOAL REACHED! 9 EPS and 2x GIZMOPLEX EVENTS! 
 MAY 4: 79% funded. T-Shirt and Poster Designs. Bonus Challenges 7 & 8!
 MAY 3: 75% funded. All About the Gizmoplex! Bonus Challenge 6!
 MAY 2: 71% funded. 3D movie + glasses unlocked! Bonus Challenge 5!
 APR 30: Joel clarifies remote production plans + new LIVE set visit reward!
 APR 29: Bonus Challenges 3 + 4: 3D Movies, New Rewards & More!
 APR 27: A Week of Livestreams: 5 Movies, 1 Jackbox Game Night & Final Telethon!
 APR 23: $3.3M GOAL REACHED! 6 EPS and GIZMOPLEX APPS! 
 APR 22:  Production Plans, Multiple Hosts and... The Return of Joel Robinson?! 
 APR 21:  Sticker Rewards DOUBLED! Livestream on 4/26.
 APR 20:  More About the GIZMOPLEX APPS! 
 APR 16:  Challenges 1-2 and How to Unlock Bonus Rewards
 APR 13:  More About Reward Levels & Add-On Rewards
 APR 9:  Joel Answers Some FAQs
 APR 8: $2.0M GOAL REACHED! 3 EPS and THE GIZMOPLEX! 
Not sure what's included in each reward level? We've got you covered: here's a chart showing all of the rewards and bonus rewards that come with each pledge package!

 Missed a live event? Rewatch here:
 Livestream 1: HOBGOBLINS w/ the MST3K LIVE TOUR CAST!
 Livestream 2: UNTAMED YOUTHw/ special guest J. ELVIS WEINSTEIN!
 Livestream 3: QUEST OF THE DELTA KNIGHTSw/ special guest MARY JO PEHL!
 Livestream 4: GAMERA vs GUIRON w/ Jonah, Hampton, Nate & Conor! 
 Live Special: JACKBOX SHOWDOWN w/ Team Jonah vs. Team Emily!
 Livestream 5: WEREWOLFw/ special guest BILL CORBETT!
 Livestream 6: ZOMBIE NIGHTMARE w/ surprise guest FRANK DIETZ!
Welcome back, everyone.
Joel Hodgson here. Before we get started, I know it's been a really long, strange, difficult 12 months for a lot of us, so I hope everyone is doing okay and staying safe.
So... where were we?
In the not-too-distant past – about 6 years ago, November 2015 AD – we ran a Kickstarter to BRING BACK MST3K after 15 years in hibernation.
It was a little bit stressful, and a lot of work, but I've gotta tell you... the whole experience went better than we had ever hoped:
Thanks to you, our campaign broke a bunch of Kickstarter records.
Over 48,000 of you took up the cause... and together, we raised over $6 million.
With your help, we got picked up on Netflix and made 20 new episodes!
And you know, you can't ever please everybody, but it seems like most of you were pretty happy with 'em.... and the critics were too: 
Also, having those new episodes on Netflix, along with a lot of our "classic" episodes, helped a lot of folks discover Mystery Science Theater for the first time. So, if you weren't there to help #BringBackMST3K... Welcome! We're glad you're here to help  #MakeMoreMST3K.
Thanks to our Kickstarter, we also built up enough momentum to experiment with taking MST3K in new directions, including three live national tours, where we got to meet thousands of you in person!  Also, during our live tours, it became really clear to me that MST3K works best when you can experience it together, with your family and friends, or your fellow MSTies.
Anyway: as you know, nothing good lasts forever.  Sometime in late 2019, during our third live tour, we got word: even though Netflix liked how our new episodes came out, they wouldn't be renewing us for a third new season.
(Sometimes, business is just business, you know? Was it disappointing not to get renewed? Well, sure. But starting now, we want to focus on looking forward, not back. And when you see what we're planning now, I hope you'll agree that this could end up being the best thing for MST3K in the long run.)
Then, the day after we finished the live tour, the whole world shut down for a year. And you know, as terrible as COVID has been, it did mean that I had plenty of time to think about where Mystery Science Theater can go next.
When I thought about it long enough, I realized three important things:
 1. The world isn't done with MST3K yet.
 We still want to make more episodes of MST3K.
A lot of you still want us to make more MST3K.
2. It's time to try something new.
If enough of you want more MST3K, maybe we don't need anyone to renew us.
From now on, we want you to decide how long MST3K keeps going.
We don't need a network to "let us" make more MST3K. We can make it for you. 
When we do, you should be the first ones to see it.
3. We need a better space for sharing MST3K, and watching it together.
Without a network, we'll need a home for new MST3K, and...
We want it to be easy to enjoy MST3K live with other people, so...
We need our own online theater for live screenings and events! 
I'm glad you asked, friend... because that's what this new Kickstarter is all about.
Thanks to all of you, Mystery Science Theater 3000 has come a long way since our first Kickstarter.  Now, if you decide to get involved again, here's what we can do next:
1. MAKE MORE MST3K episodes with a new, sustainable model, that lets you decide how long we should keep going, and lets us bring new episodes directly to you, without depending on a network to distribute or keep renewing us for new seasons.
2. BUILD THE GIZMOPLEX, our own virtual online theater, where we can host frequent live screenings, premieres, and community events – and you can host MST3K watch parties with friends whenever you want. More on that in a minute. 
Man... you're way ahead of me. 
If you were part of our first Kickstarter, this next part might sound familiar:
 If our new Kickstarter can raise at least $2,000,000, we'll be able to make three more new episodes of Mystery Science Theater 3000...but we'll also have enough to build the Gizmoplex. 
And then – just like last time – the more we raise, the more we can do! Here's what we'll be able to do at each of our goals, all the way up to our final goal of $5.5 million: 
UPDATE (5/8): We hit $6.4M, which means JOEL ROBINSON will return to HOST 2 NEW EPISODES and we'll add a 13TH NEW EPISODE!
Also, you know, we don't want to get ahead of ourselves, but if things go well, we've got a lot of other ideas we'd like to add into the mix. You can find out more about that below, and also in this Backer Update.
Now listen, I hope you're already convinced that the best reason to join our new Kickstarter is because we'll able to #MakeMoreMST3K and #BuildTheGizmoplex.
But since this is Kickstarter, let's talk about REWARDS.
I'm really proud of how most of the rewards from our first Kickstarter campaign turned out, and ever since then, a lot of you told me how much you loved them too. So, this time around, I want to do our best to "raise the bar." You'll have to decide for yourself if we pull it off, but I'll tell you that we've got a few rewards this time that I'm really excited about – especially the Gizmoplex DIY Concession Pack, our new Challenge Coins, and a pretty amazing design for an MST3K Musical Snow Globe! 
UPDATE – Since there are so many rewards to keep track of, and we want to make sure you know what to expect in each pledge level, we've also put together this chart, which has been UPDATED to include the ALL-DIGITAL EXPERIMENT 85! 
So yeah, as you can see, until you get above Experiment 500, most of the rewards "stack", which means you get all of the rewards listed in all of the lower pledge levels,  not just the new rewards listed with each pledge level. And unless it says otherwise, all reward levels above Experiment 500 include everything listed on this chart. I'm telling you, it's a lot of cool stuff. 
UPDATE (MAY 5): Joel has shared some "sneak peek" images of the designs for our new rewards, including TWO T-SHIRT DESIGNS, TWO POSTER DESIGNS, the MUSICAL SNOWGLOBE and the just-released MISSION PATCHES!
 FIRST LOOK: T-SHIRT DESIGNS 
FIRST LOOK: POSTER DESIGNS 
FIRST LOOK: MUSICAL SNOWGLOBE 
You can read more about the Musical Snowglobe in this Backer Update, but you should know that it will have a "wind-up" mechanical element in the base which plays a new rendition of the MST3K Theme Song, composed just for this reward by Paul Sabourin:
FIRST LOOK: NEW MISSION PATCH (ADD-ON) 
Also, one big change since last time is that we're now able to offer "Add-On Rewards" right here on Kickstarter. That means that we don't have to guess exactly what you'll like, or create a million different confusing pledge levels. 
Here are some of the Add-On Rewards available right now:

 SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED!
Also, just in case you missed the notice in the description of each reward level: We're not collecting shipping costs for any rewards until after the Kickstarter ends.
About 2-4 weeks after our Kickstarter campaign ends, you'll get a reward survey to give us all of the details we need, like your t-shirt size, or the name(s) you want us to use for each of the "Special Thanks" rewards. When you give us those details, we'll also collect shipping for any rewards that go in the mail!
REWARD TIMING
While a handful of rewards – like the "MST3K Season 13: Collector's Box Set" on DVD and Blu-Ray – might not be available until as late as June 2022, other rewards – like Weekly Production Updates – will start within just a few weeks of when our Kickstarter campaign ends. So, don't let the "June 2022" delivery date scare you. Kickstarter just asks us to list the latest date when we expect all rewards to be sent out.
Now, I know this is already a lot of information, especially if you already watched our video, and I think I've told you most of the really important stuff.
And, if you still want more information, there's a lot more detail below, so keep reading if you want to know more about...
How the Gizmoplex will work!
How the Gizmoplex can make MST3K better! 
How we set our funding goals!
How we'll spend whatever we raise!
Also, one of the things I like best about Kickstarter is that it's not just a "monologue," but a really great way to have a conversation with all of you who care about the show. So, if there are other things you want to know about, I hope you'll take a look at our FAQ... and if the answer isn't there, I hope you'll ask!
We'll also do our best to read and respond to all of your comments. But just so you know, I'm pretty sure that our first Kickstarter also got more comments than any project that came before it! So, if that happens again, please be patient if it takes us a little while to get to everything. We've got a whole month, and a lot more to tell you!
There's one more thing I need to say before you go, and it's pretty important:
Over the last year, as I was trying to imagine where Mystery Science Theater can go next, I also spent a lot of time thinking about how we got here.
(It's kind of crazy to realize that it's been almost six years since our first Kickstarter, and almost thirty-three years since we first aired on KTMA on Thanksgiving in 1988.)
Anyway, when I look back on everything that's happened, it's really clear that our first Kickstarter was one of the defining moments in Mystery Science history. For our first campaign, we asked you to help us make new episodes, and to prove to "the networks" that there was still an audience for MST3K... and you did!
But together, we've done a lot more than that. Thanks to you, Mystery Science Theater has been able to produce 2 new seasons, 20 new episodes, 6 comic books, 3 live national tours, and 1 record-breaking Kickstarter.
Today, I hope you'll join us again to write MST3K's next chapter: to prove that we can #MakeMoreMST3K without depending on a network to keep us alive, and to #BuildTheGizmoplex, a unique online theater where MST3K can continue to grow.
But – and this is the important part – I also want to be cautious. We're all just crawling out from COVID, and it's been a difficult year. I know that things are more difficult for a lot of people than they were during our first Kickstarter. If you decide to pledge, please: only give what feels comfortable, even if it's just a few bucks. And if you can't afford anything, that's okay too! We'll find other ways for you to stay involved, and to make sure you can still get access to all of our new episodes and Gizmoplex events.
That's all: more than anything, please just take care of yourself... and if you can't help out right now, don't think twice about it. We'll still be here when you're ready.
I guess that's everything, so... we've got 30 days. Let's see how this thing goes.
Cheers & Thanks,
Joel


Hey, you're still here. So, I guess you want more details, huh?
Oh yeah, that's right. Thanks for reminding me.
I think the Gizmoplex might be the biggest "new idea" we're working with this time around, so there are a lot of details and possibilities I'm excited to share with you as we go. Here's what you should know right away.
Having a Gizmoplex All-Access Pass has three important benefits:
1. Live Premieres & Events: The Gizmoplex will host at least TWO LIVE EVENTS EVERY MONTH for our first year, where you can join me, our cast and writers, and some special surprise guests. Each event will be like a night at the theater, and will have a lot of fun surprises. Some of our ideas include theme nights hosted by our cast and special guests, live commentaries, and maybe even live riffing! Also, we won't just screen episodes: it'll be a real show, and could include new sketches, trailers (done "MST3K style"), live Q&A panel discussions, interviews, contests... and the return of the MST3K "viewer mail" segment! (And yes, if you can't make one, you'll be able to see it after.)
2. The MST3K Watch Club: To make it easier to watch MST3K with your friends, the Gizmoplex will also be the official home of the MST3K Watch Club! Each month, you'll get on-demand access to a new selection of episodes, and the ability to host your own live screenings for up to 10 people! Anyone with a Gizmoplex Pass can join for free, and if you want to invite someone who doesn't, they can get a "Day Pass" for just $0.99!
3. Gizmoplex Apps: Since we reached our second goal ($3.3M) we'll be able to develop apps that bring the Gizmoplex to mobile devices and TVs! Right now, the plan is to include apps for six of the most popular platforms: iOS, Android, AppleTV, AndroidTV, FireTV and Roku. And no promises, but we're also looking into apps for XBOX, PlayStation and Samsung TVs. Like Crow says: we're gonna conquer cyberspace, man! (Read more about the apps here.)
So, if you think about it, we think it's a pretty different model than we could pull off anywhere else. I really want the Gizmoplex to feel like something new: less like another Netflix with nothing but MST, and more like a charming, off the radar, suburban cineplex that plays movies for 99 cents, long after their first run.
If we get this right, the Gizmoplex Pass won't just give you a monthly subscription to a catalog of MST3K episodes, or a place to watch the episodes you own on-demand: it'll be more like a "Season Pass" that gives you tickets to every show at your favorite theater: front row, opening night, every time. Take that, Moviepass!
You can read a LOT more about our plans for the Gizmoplex in this Backer Update.
Also, even though this won't make a lot of sense until I give you more details, there's one more thing I want you to understand:
The Gizmoplex won't just be our new online theater and event space. It's also going to be an important new location that The Mads are creating on the show, and inside the world of Mystery Science Theater, as their next step toward world domination: the first cineplex on the moon!
Anyway, I think it'll all make sense when you see it... but until then, remember, “It’s just a show, I should really just relax.”
So, there you have it: in a nutshell, this is what we want to do. After 33 years, it's time for Mystery Science "Theater" to have an actual (virtual) theater that MSTies can call their own. It's time... to #BuildTheGizmoplex.
Any other questions?
Oh, wait. I think I know what you're going to ask. 
Just like last time, I'm sure some of you are wondering, so go ahead and ask. 
I knew that's what you were gonna ask! And since we're asking you to pledge some of your hard-earned money – especially after a difficult year – I want to be really open and transparent about this. So, let's break this down a little bit.
1. Without a network supporting us, we need to fund everything ourselves. During our first Kickstarter, we estimated that, once production was up and running, we'd be able to produce new episodes for about $250K each. In the end, though, the budget for each new episode ended up being closer to $350K. For the last two seasons, we were able to cover the difference through our deal with Netflix... but this time, we're on our own. We've got a lot of ways we can keep the budget lower, but, you know... it's still going to cost something. And when you think about it, $350K for 90 minutes of television is still one of the best deals in show business.
2. We still can't spend everything we raise on Kickstarter to make the show.
Campaign Fees: Between Kickstarter and the credit card processor, we pay about 8% of your pledge in fees. There's also a fee for CrowdOx, the platform we'll use to manage all of your surveys and rewards after the campaign ends.
Making Rewards: We reserve about 20% of your pledge in order to design, produce, print, sort and pack all of your rewards. And that's not even including shipping, which we're not collecting until after our Kickstarter campaign ends!
Dedicated Support: During our first Kickstarter, we underestimated the amount of work involved in providing customer support and creating detailed backer updates, so we had to depend on volunteers to do a lot of it. This time, we want to make sure we're prepared, so we budgeted about 4% of each pledge for that.
Building & Running the Gizmoplex: We really want the Gizmoplex to be great, but getting it started will take some work – and keeping it running also means we'll have some monthly fees to cover. We also need some budget to support all of the special live events we're planning to host. So, we're using about 3% of your pledge for that.
When you put it all together, we have to spend about 35% of what we raise just to cover Kickstarter expenses, and to keep all the promises we're making to you.

3. The more episodes we make, the less each one costs! Like we explained during our first Kickstarter, the basic idea is pretty simple: for some parts of production, we have to spend the same amount up front, no matter how many episodes we're making.
For example, let's say that our writers realize the show needs a custom-built oversized rubber chicken. No matter how many episodes we have, it's going to cost $1000 to make. So, if we only use it in three episodes, we have to spend $333 per episode on a rubber chicken. But, if we use the chicken in twelve episodes, that $1000 goes a lot farther, and our rubber chicken kaiju only costs us $83 for each episode. Make sense?
     Based on those numbers, you can see that the cost for each episode gets lower as the number of episodes goes up:
So yeah, just like our first Kickstarter, I know that a fair number of you won't care about these types of details... but since some of you will, we want to be as clear as possible.
1. KEEP CIRCULATING THE URL. Back in the day, MST3K wasn’t seen nationwide and we encouraged people to record the shows on VHS and send them to their friends and loved ones. It was our version of “I Want My MTV.” Every episode of MST3K ended with a message that encouraged MSTies to “Keep Circulating the Tapes,” and you guys did. Then, in our last Kickstarter, we updated that to "Keep Circulating the URL," and you did that too. Now, we've got a new URL, so we're asking you again:
2. FOLLOW @MST3K ON SOCIAL MEDIA. Be sure you're following our account on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube. Those are one of our best ways to keep everyone up-to-date on what's going on, so encourage your fellow MSTies to follow them too! We really appreciate it, and we couldn’t do it without you. You’re like our virtual street team!
3. CIRCULATE THE MESSAGE FROM EACH UPDATE. From now until our Kickstarter ends on May 7, most of the backer updates that we send will include a suggested message or image. Copy, paste, and post them on your own social accounts to help spread the word. It's as simple as that! 
4. CHECK IN WITH YOUR FELLOW MSTIES.  We don't want you to pressure anyone, but we do hope you'll check in to make sure they know about this Kickstarter.  And when you do, be sure to remind them that pledging even a $1 token pledge will still help us unlock more Challenge Goals, Bonus Rewards, and get them weekly updates all the way through the production of Season 13!
5. JOIN OUR "VIRTUAL STREET TEAM." If you've got a little extra time, and want to make sure we reach our final goal, there are more specific ways to volunteer and help. If you want to get specific "assignments" to help us #MakeMoreMST3K, you can sign up to be part of our elite volunteer team.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As we learned last time, there are always risks with Kickstarter... and the world is a little crazier right now than usual. Here are a few that we've considered:

• After a difficult economic year, this might not be a good time for some people to offer financial support to a robot puppet show dedicated to cheesy movies.

• COVID is a huge unknown, and could still impact all sorts of things, from our production schedule and approach, to our timeframe for producing and delivering your rewards.

• Another ship could block the Suez Canal, trapping your challenge coins and snow globes for weeks, months, or years. But also, what are the odds it'll happen twice in one year?

• Building the Gizmoplex is a big undertaking, and we'll be depending on a few tech partners to make specific parts of the experience possible. So, if one of our partners ran into problems, there's always a risk of that affecting the Gizmoplex.

Produced By D 

Founded in 2019 and Supervised by Jay Wang.

Artisan Coin is a New Brand focusing on the world's highest quality and coolest coin gaffs and accessories.

We have put infinite collaborative efforts into this.

All coin magicians will agree that the quality of the coin gaff directly affects your performance experience. Therefore,  every Artisan Coin has been through three different standards quality control, manual adjustment, and refinement to perfect every detail.

Included are our original and extensive instructional tutorial videos. This allows you to fully maximize the value of each set of gaffs, no matter if you are a beginner or a professional.

At the same time, we want coin gaffs not to be expensive niche toys, but to be everyday carry items that magicians carry around, so we will sell all our products at AMAZING prices. We also believe great magic is not about the price.

We also devote ourselves to exquisite and fashionable packaging, so that you can enjoy the unboxing experience.

We will do our best to bring you every new surprise.

Every coin is manually adjusted.
Every coin passes three quality controls.
Artisan Coin, A Fresh Height On Coin Gaffs.
Backers will be the first in the world to get their hands on the Artisan Coin series.
The follow-up sale will be at the end of 2022 if it's funded.
 Extreme & Unique discount, only for Kickstarter backers. 
 The instructions are FREE for our Kickstarter Backers. 
Thanks to Kickstarter's crowd-funding features, we were able to be more demanding on the product itself and further lower the price. We now pass on these savings to you.

By supporting our projects, you will be helping us share the cost of mass production and allow more enthusiasts and even professionals to experience the value of quality products that are made in China.
In 1847, J. N. Hofzinser invented the Shell. 

This was a clear indication to all magicians that Coin Magic from that day forth will be forever changed. 

During the last 170 years, magicians have built endlessly upon this genius invention. Transpositions, vanishes, appearances, Penetrations. It's hard to imagine that one could create the most incredible miracles with something so simple

In the field of Coin Magic, where sleight of hand is inevitable, the Coin Shell is undoubtedly the best tool. 
Even after over 170 years, the Coin Shell is still one of the must-have gaffs for any coin magicians. What's more, there are as many coin shells as there are different types of coins.

The question is, what makes an excellent Shell?

We have proposed four criteria to measure the quality of a coin shell.

 Closeness: The gap between the edge of the Shell and the edge of the coin. The smaller the better.
 Fit: The degree of adhesion between the coin case and the surface of the coin. The better the fit, the better the quality.
 Coverage: The degree to which the edge of the coin shell covers the edge of the coin underneath. The more coverage the better.
 Degree of deformation: The coin needs to be flattened in order to expand the coin shell. During this process, the deformation of the pattern is as minimal as possible.
To improve each criterion requires consideration of many factors. The reason being there are contradictions between each of these criteria. 

For example, if you want more coverage, you must make it deeper. However, if you make it deeper, it will cause losses in the degree of deformation. In the production process, it is very likely that to enhance one criterion, other criteria will be affected. There is a delicate balance to be struck here.
We spent a year of continuous testing, scrapping, and retesting, and adding manual processes into the production, to make these four criteria to the most satisfactory level. 

Here we are: Artisan Coin Expanded Shell.
PLAY

In addition to the craftsmanship, the value of an Expanded Coin Shell is also reflected in the performance. The Artisan Coin series entire line of products is accompanied by, what we believe to be the most comprehensive and original instructional videos ever.

In the instructional videos, there are six complete routines that have been tested across numerous actual performances: Coin Across, Table Coin Across, Coin to Glass, Coin Through Table, Three Fly, Half Set Routine. [You will need 4 regular Kennedy half dollars, which are NOT included, to perform the routines in the instructional videos.]

What you see in the promotional trailer is just a small part of the full instructional video. The instructional video will help you quickly grasp the essence of the Expanded Shell, and also allow you to perform wonderful coin effects at a moment's notice.
We have also included a section on repairing your Shell which will allow you to easily repair a slightly damaged coin shell.

The coin shell can be said to be the foundation of modern coin magic gaffs. It is because of the coin shell, that all kinds of amazing coin gaffs were created in the century that followed.

The Coin Shell is also where the Artisan Coin series begins. 

We hope that each meticulous detail will bring you a brand-new experience, and have more people experience the charm of coin magic.
Poetic routine.
High-precision gaff coin, the appearance is almost the same as a regular coin.
Re-milled Half-dollar edge, allowing for a more simplified handling and can more routines.
Comprehensive instructional video, which includes six routines and new techniques.
Although the Sun & Moon Coin was only circulated within a small circle of coin workers, it has also been favored by many coin masters.

Curtis Kam once said, “The Sun & Moon Coins allows one to perform one of the most impressive and memorable coin magic ever created." The Sun & Moon coins in the hands of masters such as Geoff Latta, David Neighbors, Roger Klause, etc. also create all kinds of marvels.

The changes between the sun and moon, sunset and sunrise. This is the unique romance of The Sun & Moon coins.

Check the Video:
PLAY

- In the original version, due to the size, the penny shell could not fit over the half-dollar. Hence, some coins could only be concealed using sleight of hand.
- For the Artisan Coin series, we have specially made a half-dollar, which is trimmed and re-milled. The appearance is no different from a regular half-dollar. However, because it can fit into the penny shell, the difficulty during the performance is greatly reduced and can be easily controlled, even for a novice.

Even the producer of the trailer commented that it was no different from shooting a regular coin.  Hence we have added the split after the coin roll, in order to dispel any comments that we are using a regular coin for the trailer.

This should be the highest praise for our Sun & Moon Coins.
Again, for you to fully extract the value of the Sun & Moon coins, the instructional video will be more compressive than you imagine.

Including 6 complete routines that have withstood countless actual performances: Sun & Moon, CBH1, CBH2, Hopping SM, CS Transposition, Three Colors Fly, and Shell Repairing.

 We believe you will enjoy this.

Just use a romantic and poetic routine to conquer your audience.
In 1967, a magician from Scotland named Jim Boyd invented the prop called ‘Confusing Coins’.

He would not have imagined that the ‘Confusing Coins’ would become one of the world's most popular magic coin gaffs half a century later: The 'Hopping Half’.
Imagine having two coins, one silver, and one copper, in your hand. You take one of the coins cleanly and put it in your pocket. Then you open your hand and find that both coins are still there.

After repeating this three times, you then slowly place the copper coin in your pocket and open your hand. Where the audience expects to see two coins, the coins have now disappeared.

In our minds, we might think that performing such an incredible coin effect may require a lot of complicated sleights. However, whether you have practiced magic prior to this or not, when you pick up this gaff set, you will be performing the same effect in 3 minutes.

Check The Video:
PLAY

Such an unexpected effect and its easy operation had made the Hopping Halves one of the most famous gaff effects in the world. 

However, its strength goes far beyond that.

The Hopping Half is a set that consists of multiple gaffs. if these were used separately, it also encompasses the functions of a variety of other gaffs: The Expanded Shell, original Sun and Moon coin, and 3CM.

The Expanded Shell in Artisan Coin Hopping Half set is the Artisan Coin Expanded Shell, which is a must-have for every coin worker.
The 3CM consists of two shells and one coin, allowing you to perform the vanishes and appearances of three coins. The 3CM included in the Hopping Half set has a double-sided coin, so it also includes a color-changing effect.

This is the Hopping Half. 

With apparently only two coins, numerous routines are possible.
A good set of props must not only have an ingenious design but also must have exquisite craftsmanship to be usable. 

The Artisan Coin Hopping Half has undergone long-term experimentation and trial to ensure that the coin shells have a high degree of closeness, fit, and coverage.

If you want, you could toss and catch not only the USA coins but also the entire nested group of copper coins.

The Instructional video includes 7 routines that have been refined through countless actual performances: Hopping Half, CBH1, CBH2, Sun & Moon, Hanging Coppers, CS, Three Colors Fly.

It includes the presentation of two classical routines (the routine, Back in Time requires two additional regular coins), as well as very practical routines such as the Sun and Moon routine...

We believe that Artisan Coin Hopping Half will reap unexpected benefits.
Even if you do not have an in-depth knowledge of coin magic, you would have heard of the Flipper Coins a bit.

During the Spring Festival Gala of 2010, Lu Chen shocked the whole of China by performing Dean Dill’s coins through table. And Eric Joes also use Oxy-Clean to fool Penn & Teller.

Being chosen to be performed by these top coin magicians is enough to prove its value.

Whether it is penetrations or vanishes, The Flipper Coin can achieve these effects in a super-visual way. Whether it is penetrations or vanishes, The Flipper Coin can achieve these effects in a super-visual way.

Certainly, the prerequisite of all this is for you to have a great quality Flipper Coin.
And we think we made it.
In order to produce the most ideal Flipper Coin, we have mustered the best craftsmanship that was initially used only on high-end silver coins, and instilled them into the Artisan Coin Half-Dollar Flipper Coin, and chose what we believe to be the best structure.

Due to the different workings and principles of The Flipper Coins, they are further segregated into gravity, magnetic, elastic, and Pro Elastic... Even many coin enthusiasts are unclear of the differences, let alone those that have never heard of them.

What we have used is an internal groove and also re-milled the edges. The use of a shim allows for it to switch between gravity and magnetic mode. High-precision wire cutting produces gimmicks that are hard to decern even at close range. The shell and coin nests perfectly, almost no different from a regular coin.

This coin can be said to meet all of your flipper needs.

Check the Video:
PLAY

High-precision cut. Probably the most undetectable at present.
Internal groove with re-milled edges. Almost identical to regular coins.
Probably one of the easiest Flipper Coins to maintain.
Gravity and magnetic dual system.
In addition to the craftsmanship, we have also prepared an original and comprehensive instructional video.

It contains works that have never been published and teaches a total of 6 well-designed routines that have gone through countless actual performances: Coin Across, Coin Through Table, NOXF 1&2 (Need Ex-Shell), COXF, Coin Through Glass, Flipper Three Fly. 
[You will need 4 regular Kennedy half dollars to perform some of the routines in the instructional videos.]

Detailed explanations will allow you to quickly master these routines.

The routines also include new handlings of opening and closing the gimmick, displays, and other convincers. Hence, if you want to build your own Flipper Coin routine, this tutorial will also give you all the techniques that you need.
Another "Century-old Classic"：
Due to the development of machining technology, coin gaffs have gradually formed over the past hundred years. Those that can have remained till this day are all treasures of Magic. 

The Artisan Coin series is committed to redefining these "Century-old classics" coin gaffs with modern technology and craftsmanship.

The Tri-fold Coin is undoubtedly an indispensable classic.

Referring to its earliest record, in "Modern Magic" in 1876, Professor Hoffmann hid it in a magic wand and used it to conjure a coin. Since then, the Folding Coin was developed for more usage and has gradually become one of the more popular coin gaffs in the world.
The Choice of Masters
The signature usage of a folding Coin is well known to most, the “Coin in Bottle” and “Coin Bite” are seen frequently on TV and Street Magic specials.

Familiar masters, such as Michael Ammar and the late David Roth, also have their own routines using the Folding Coin.

Expert Coin Magic records the coins across and coins through table effects by Roth using the Folding Coin. The World's Greatest Magic video teaching series has also released a magic compilation on Folding Coins.

Meticulous Craftsmanship
The structure of the Folding Coin is very simple. However, there are two important details that affect the user’s experience.

*Precision cuts:
Although regular cutting is not a problem for everyday performances, we still utilized a more precise cutting method. Hence, the cut marks on the coin are difficult to detect even at very close distances. The eagle on the Tail side of the coin can be observed up to a close distance of 30cm. The Head side can be observed at a close distance of 80cm or further for maximum safety.
*Deeper side grooves:
If you have ever performed the coin through bottle effect using a Folding coin, you would encounter a common problem. That is, the folded-coin will sometimes fall apart. This minimizes it.
Artisan Coin HD Folding Coin
Let's go with the video first:
PLAY

Precise cuts. Probably the most concealed tri-fold coin.
The side grooves are deepened to 2mm+ to increase stability.
Online instructional video includes basic handling, as well as new techniques, and coin through table routine.
In the instructional video of the Artisan Folding Coin, in addition to the classic effects of the coin in bottle and coin bite, Jay Wang will show you new techniques of using Folding Coins:

- Double-sided display during coin bite.
- Visual coin productions and vanishes.
- A very visual three-phase coin through table effect, which makes the routine extremely thought-provoking.

Go and enjoy : )
Last of the Six works released in the Artisan Coin HD Series.

This is also the one with the most complex craftsmanship and the highest precision requirements among the six items.
Artisan Coin HD CSB
CSB is one of the cleverest inventions in coin gaffs. It is also one of the most powerful transposition effects in coin magic.

No matter how deep your knowledge is regarding coin tricks and coin gaffs, a good CSB routine will short-circuit your brain in an instant.

Even if you open and laid out the secret in front of your eyes, you will surely be stunned by its simple structure, and then suddenly realize it and applaud in awe.

The CSB originated from the two copper coins and one silver coin transposition routine by Conrad Haden. Presley Guitar invented the CSB by replacing one of the copper coins with an ancient Chinese coin on top of the foundation of Conrad’s routine. The hole in the middle of the Chinese coin gives the audience the impression that the coin is not replaced, so the whole effect is completely refined and elevated.

It is not a simple task to make the ancient Chinese coin look identical to a regular coin when nested. Therefore, the built-quality of the gaffed coin is the foundation for achieving such a powerful effect. And making the gaffed coin look as much as possible like a regular coin is the ultimate goal when crafting the CSB.

The usual process of most mass-produced CSB sets was to directly stick the Chinese coin on the silver coin shell after being thinned. Therefore, the edge of the coin would be composed of two parts, one is the edge of the silver coin, and the other is the edge of the copper coin. This is the same for the double-sided gaff coin. This process is a common practice and is easier to implement during mass production.
However, For the Artisan Coin, this is far from satisfactory.
For the Artisan Coin CSB set, we adopted a process that was only used for high-end coin gaffs:
No layering on the edge of the coin. After more than half a year of experimentation, finally, the coin shell and double-sided coin can be been merged into one at the mass production stage.
The gap of the gaffed coin is completely fitted, making the surface of the gaffed coin no different from a regular coin.
The matching regular coin also has a very intricate design. In order to make the regular copper coin and the double-sided coin appear the same in size and appearance, we have specially made the copper coin a hair smaller.
In addition,  as always, in order to let you get started quickly and extract its full value, we have included 4 routines that have passed countless actual performances: CSB Routine, Hopping CSB1, Hopping CSB2, Three Colors Fly.
This includes content that has never been published. In addition to the visual transposition effects, it also includes interactive routines with the audience. In addition, the original handling methods will absolutely inspire you.

High degree of detail. The face is exactly the same as the regular coin.

campaign.story:
Pledges made in BackerKit will contribute to this stretch goal!
It's finally here! The chance for you to design your own customizable game screen. Purchase the components you want to make the screen you need. Use it for your favorite game, or switch it up and use it with ALL of your favorite games. There's no limit to what you can do with the right tools!
With this Kickstarter you'll be able to buy a screen in one of two orientations in up to 9 colors. You'll be able to add inserts to it in different configurations depending on your needs. You'll be able to clip a binder of inserts to it if you want. You'll be able to add magnets to some panels, track character conditions, add initiative cards to the top of the screen, and SO MUCH MORE!

The Kickstarter
At Hammerdog Games we believe DMs and GMs should have the best tools at their fingertips. That's why, for over a decade, we've been producing and selling The World's Greatest Screen, a 4-panel, 8-pocket customizable game screen. Customer feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, and every year we hear from customers who own multiple screens, and whose screens have lasted them for years.
As a result, it has not been easy for us to find a reason or even a way to improve the screen itself. It's sturdy, durable, reusable, and washable. It works with wet and dry erase markers. And our fans love it. It's a hard act to follow!
So with this Kickstarter we decided to give you the tools to trick it out. You can
Add inserts as needed for your game system, adventure, or individual encounter.
Add a Tome of Inserts that you can flip through in-game so that you have the exact tables that you want when you want them.
Add magnet receptive inserts so that magnets will stick to the screen. 
Use magnets to track initiative, status conditions, results you rolled on certain tables, and so on.
Add art packs to the outside of your screen to project your game, your personality, or both.
Make the screen you've always wanted!
We just need a bit of help from you! We've set a super low monetary goal because all the hard work for this Kickstarter is done. We just need to know how many orders we have so we can get to shipping them!
As a result, we've turned this Kickstarter into a Blitzstarter. We are running a super short campaign with just a few stretch goals. We will begin to fulfill shortly after the Kickstarter begins, with the goal of delivering to all backers in the USA within 30 days of closure.
The World's Greatest Screen 
PLAY


 The World's Greatest Inserts 
PLAY


 Magnet Power
PLAY


 Tricking Out Your Screen 
PLAY




With this Kickstarter we are introducing a whole new product for Hammerdog Games - The World's Greatest Inserts, short name, TWGi. These inserts are jam packed with information on one side, and a nice piece of art on the other. Fill the pockets of your screen with any combination of inserts, and change them mid-game if you like.
There are two kinds of inserts presented in this Kickstarter - Art Packs, and Fantasy RPG Inserts. Future Kickstarters will be launched for inserts that can be used with other games.
Art Packs 
These packs contain 4 double-sided full color inserts. There is high quality art covering both sides. Art packs are themed and can show standard RPG imagery - like fairies and dragons, or other imagery that reflects the personality of the screen's owner - like cats and dogs.
Art Pack - Classic Characters (Contains 4 double-sided inserts)
TWGi Set 1 - Fantasy Pack
The primary release for this Kickstarter is for our first fantasy series, 25 inserts that contain high quality fantasy art on one side, and themed random tables on the other. The themes and tables make them compatible with DnD 5e and Pathfinder 1e. However, they contain so much good information that they can be easily used with or adapted to other game systems.
Just a Sample of All the Wonderful Tables and Charts Available to You
You can fill your screen with any combination of inserts, or store them all in the Tome of Inserts. You can clip the Tome to your screen, replacing or adding a panel to it by doing so. As you flip through the binder, that panel "changes" to be exactly what you need. You can of course, always use the Tome like a normal reference book.
The World's Greatest Inserts Set 1 - Fantasy Pack can be used to generate the bulk of an adventure, either before you begin play, or randomly during it. The inserts are designed to work together to fill the most common needs of GMs and DMs, whether they are running a premade adventure or a sandbox campaign. 
Here is a simple example of how you can combine these inserts to create an entire story quickly and easily. Note that the Owlbear insert is part of Stretch Goal 1, and is a sneak peek at a future product.

Lair of the Feather Bear
It's a cold and rainy night, and your players want to throw some dice. You agree even though you have nothing prepared. That's OK. They're not the greatest at staying on track anyways. So you grab your screen, your books, and your favorite inserts. You decide to put your friends up against an Owlbear, and decide that it would be fun if it was an arctic variant. You check your inserts and your options, and within minutes, have the backbone of an adventure ready to go.

 The adventure begins in a tavern. 
On the cold steppes of a northern town.

 The tavern is filled with interesting characters, one of which has a quest. 

The group leaves the tavern and travel south to the hills.

 Exploring the hills, they find a cave. 

The cave is guarded by an Owlbear.

 Whose lair contains several valuable treasures. 
Fantasy Pack 1: Table of Contents
The complete list of 25 inserts in this Fantasy Pack is as follows:
DM Aids: Group Tracker
Rules: DnD 5e or Pathfinder 1e
Environments: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Grassland/Plains, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underground, Underwater, Urban
Locations: Cave, Dungeon, Market, Ruins, Tavern, Huts, Homes, Hovels
Discovery: Food & Drink, [Mushrooms, Berries, Fruit], Treasures - Tier 1
People: NPC (two parts)


Virtual Tabletops
TWGi Will Be FoundryVTT and Roll20® Compatible
With VTTs surging in popularity and many of us spending all of our RPG time online, it became an obvious choice to officially support them. We are proud to say that The World's Greatest Screen will be produced for Roll20® and FoundryVTT!
These modules will allow you to generate all results from an entire sheet in three clicks or one table at a time with the use of sleek macros and a comprehensible user experience. TWGi on virtual tabletops are very easy to use and understand, so they will always be viable tools for quick adventure generation as seen in the example above!

All of the items in this Kickstarter are available individually, or in bundles. Bundles tend to have more value than purchasing items individually.

The World's Greatest Screen - $25
Our classic screen is the foundation of this project. Its sturdy construction ensures that it will last through years of use. It boasts 4 panels with 8 pockets that hold inserts up to 8.5" x 11" in size. It is available in 9 colors and 2 orientations. It works with wet and dry erase markers.

Orientation
Tall/Portrait/Vertical
Available in Silver, Gold, Black, Red, Pink, Blue, Green, Purple, and Orange
Orientation
Wide/Landscape/Horizontal
Available in Silver, Gold, Black, Red, Pink, Blue, Green, Purple, and Orange
TWGi Fantasy Pack 1 - $20
Our flagship product in this line boasts 25 inserts with a fantasy theme. Each insert is double-sided with scenic or fantasy art on one side, and intricate random tables on the other side. These tables can be used to inspire DMs and GMs, to allow them to generate content on the fly, or even to create adventures and side quests with ease.

Available for 5th edition or Pathfinder
Available in Portrait or Landscape format
Available and compatible with Roll20® and FoundryVTT
 BONUS! Sneak Peek of Fantasy Pack 2! **5** stretch goals add an ENCOUNTER insert to this reward for FREE. ENCOUNTER inserts are double-sided insert that contain an iconic monster on each side.
Tome of Inserts - $25
You can store and organize your inserts efficiently with the Tome of Inserts. This 3-ring binder comes with TWGi Set 1 - Fantasy Pack and a page protector for each insert. The binder can be easily clipped to your screen, replacing or even adding a panel to it. Then you can simply flip through all your inserts mid-game, "changing" your screen on the fly. The binder is a standard 3-ring with external pockets. An empty Tome of Inserts is known as a Tome of Holding.

Fantasy Pack 1 and stretch goals.
1 page protector for each insert.
1 3-ring binder to hold and organize your inserts and, if you like, to add a panel to your screen. Note: Binder color may not match your screen color exactly.
Magnet Power - $10
Take your screen to the next level with this add-on. Not magnets themselves, magnet receptive inserts are made of material that magnets stick to. Simply slide these into any panel on your screen and BAM! You can now use magnets with that panel.

2 Magnet Receptive Inserts that fit The World's Greatest Screen.
Magnets will stick to these Inserts through the pockets.
One side of the magnet receptive insert is adhesive, so you can create your own custom insert that works with magnets.
PDF containing Party Trackers that can be printed and used with these inserts.
Magnet Pack - $10
Complete your magnet upgrade with this set of tools. Use them with Magnet Power to create a magnetic party tracker. Use them to pin initiative trackers to the top of your screen. Use them to track your rolls on random tables. Use them any way you want to!

10 Round ceramic magnets, numbered 1-10.
10 Pushpin Magnets in 5 colors.
10 Initiative/Information Cards
TWGi Art Packs - $5 per set
Dress up your screen with these fun art packs. Each contains 4 double sided sheets with high quality art on each side. Available in both horizontal and vertical 

Classic Characters

Worlds Beyond - [UNLOCKED WITH STRETCH GOAL 5] 
Add-Ons
Customize your pledge by adding anything to your purchase. Or simply build your screen with only the components you like. Simply pledge more than the tier you want. Then use your extra pledge money to buy these awesome Add-Ons.
Art Pack - $5 – Contains 4 double sided inserts of a specific theme.
Tome of Holding - $10 – A binder with pocket protectors for inserts, but NO inserts are included.
Magnet Power - $10 –2 High Quality Magnet Receptive Inserts with adhesive on 1 side. PDF of templates for party and initiative trackers.
Magnet Pack - $10 - 10 Neodymium Pushpin Magnets, 10 Ceramic Circle Magnets numbered 1-10, 10 wet/dry erase Initiative Cards.
VTT Inserts - $20 – TWGi Set 1 Fantasy Pack (+Stretch Goals) produced for Roll20® and FoundryVTT.
Printed Inserts - $20 – TWGi Set 1 Fantasy Pack (+Stretch Goals) in hard copy.
Tome of Inserts - $25 - TWGi Set 1 Fantasy Pack (+Stretch Goals) in hard copy, plus a Binder, and 1 Page Protector for every insert.
Screen - $25 – The World’s Greatest Screen plus 6 Double Sided “Teaser” Inserts that will be replaced if you add Printed Inserts or the Tome of Inserts to your pledge.

Want more options? Want free stuff? Please help spread the word about this Kickstarter so we can unlock as many stretch goals as possible. 
ART PACKS - Some stretch goals unlock art packs that can be purchased as add-ons. Each art pack contains 4 double-sided pages with a single theme, such as dragons, undead, and furry friends.

ENCOUNTER INSERTS - Some stretch goals unlock encounter inserts which are added to the Tome of Inserts for FREE. These special inserts offer a series of tables to use when encountering iconic monsters. These tables might create a unique lair for the creature, allow the GM to create a new version of it, or even control its behavior.
For example "Encounter an Owlbear" contains tables and information that allow you to
Generate the creature's lair and treasures within it. 
Reward players that successfully harvest the creature's body. 
Generate a new kind of owlbear such as a giant owlbear, a winged owlbear, or an alternate creature like a ravenbear.
Pit the group against a skeleton or zombie version of an owlbear.
Use the "Fighting" table to keep players on their toes. Each roll makes the owlbear do something interesting in combat, keeping the fight exciting and fresh even for players who have been fighting owlbears for years! This feature is a MUST HAVE for brand new DMs and crusty veterans alike. 
Funded! - $100
We need very little in order to fund this project, just a handful of customers willing to give it a try!

If these stretch goals get knocked down early, we'll add some more stretch goals to keep things interesting. Check the top of the Kickstarter for our FREE x-mas themed inserts you unlocked so far!



At Hammerdog Games we believe that DMs and GMs should have the best tools at their fingertips. Every product we make echoes our core design philosophies by being customizable, reusable, and affordable. We are extremely proud to bring this Kickstarter to you, as it is a shining example of our beliefs.
We had meant to bring this Kickstarter to you earlier this year, but like so many other businesses, we were hit hard by the COVID-19 pandemic. Now as the year comes to a close, we hope this Kickstarter will add some much needed lifeblood to our company, so that we can make even cooler stuff for you in the future. 
Hammerdog Games is a virtual company with no employees. We do however, have a couple of mutts that work very hard to bring solid products to customers just like you.




Caring for The World's Greatest Screen
The  World’s Greatest Screen was constructed to be durable, and sturdy, and to last for years. Still, it is not invulnerable. Here are some tips for keeping it usable for a long time to come.
PRINT YOUR OWN INSERTS ON CARDSTOCK
Cardstock makes it easier to put inserts into pockets and to remove them again.
AVOID EXCESSIVE HEAT
The World’s Greatest Screen is a vinyl product. Excessive heat can make the pockets loose. It can also cause some toners and ink to stick to the inside of the pocket, which will mar its appearance.
AVOID EXCESSIVE COLD
Being made of vinyl, The World’s Greatest Screen can crack and split if it freezes.
AVOID EXCESSIVE WEIGHT
Don’t store your screen at the bottom of a stack of books. The pressure can  cause some inks and toners to stick to the inside of the pockets.
AVOID DARK MAGIC
Although it is considered unwise to expose The World's Greatest Screen to magic of any variety, dark magic is especially hazardous. Not because it harms the screen, but because The World's Greatest Screen kind of likes it.
WASH IT IF NEEDED
If your screen gets dirty, you can clean it with wet wipes or with a cool soap and water. Make sure you don’t use anything that could scratch the screen.
DO NOT FEED IT AFTER MIDNIGHT
The World’s Greatest Screen is happy to pull an all-nighter any time. But if you feed it after midnight we can’t be held responsible for what happens next.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have done our best to mitigate the risks in this project. The World's Greatest Screen is already fully designed. The inserts are ready to be printed, we just need to know how many of which to print. We have some small concerns with the virtual tabletop inserts simply because they are time consuming and may take a bit longer to construct than hoped. And we have another small concern that if the Kickstarter blows up, we may be a bit slower to fulfill it than we'd hoped. But otherwise we believe we've done what we can to ensure that this Kickstarter runs very smoothly for you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
The World's Greatest Screen is made of strong cardstock and virgin vinyl for years of use. We have had dozens of customers tell us that their screen has lasted them 10 years or more. The inserts will be usable as long as their RPGs are relevant which historically, has proven to be decades.
Reusability and recyclability
The #1 feature of The World's Greatest Screen is its reusability. Owners can utilize it in countless configurations and for any RPG in the world. The inserts are designed to be used over and over in endless game sessions, configuring and reconfiguring them to suit each particular game or session. For some people it will be the last screen they ever own.

updates.update_userinfo: Fulfillment Continues
updates.update_content:
Hello everybody!
Several of you have received your order and are sending me comments and encouragement. Thank you! Hammerdog is a business but we run primarily on our love for games and the gaming industry. When we make you happy with one of our products - and you tell us - you are truly giving us what we need to succeed. So again, thank you.
Some of you "Christmas" folks received your order with a minor error, and a few of you still haven't received your order. Hang in there! I'm seeing that there are clearly regions more backed up than others (PA *WHAT* is going on?). If you need me to track your package please LMK but I won't be able to do it until Monday (daddy duties call). If you have a problem with your order, just reach out to me via Kickstarter.

updates.update_userinfo: Fulfillment Continuing This Week - 2 Day Delay
updates.update_content:
Happy New Year Everybody!
Two bits of data for you today. First, Christmas folks should start getting packages this week. You may recall a delayed shipment from the printer that I mentioned on the last update. Those did arrive but unfortunately, there were errors on a few sheets and I had to get them redone (the errors were on OUR part, not the printers). If you are in the USA, and don't have your "Christmas" package by Friday, please let me know.
Second, fulfillment for non-Christmas folks will start this week. It will be a bit slow to start as I chose not to use a 3rd party fulfillment house for this. Most of you are unconcerned about the timing on this, but I thought I'd let you know anyways.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Update - Christmas Chaos
updates.update_content:
Folks, I'm sorry to say that things did not go our way last week. A snowstorm on the east coast of the US cancelled a critical UPS pickup of our inserts and as a result, I am missing several of them. Even expediting them failed to speed things up. It appears the snowstorm created too much stress on an already overburdened shipping system. I'm very sorry.
As I'm sure some of you are aware, the post office is reporting massive backups across the country. I entertained allowing those of you with XMas presents to switch to UPS but it was much more expensive and would have required me to rebill you for freight. Add to that the fact that of my last 2 UPS orders, one went AWOL for 5 days (delivered to the wrong address), and the last one was delivered by a contractor in a mini van rather than UPS themselves. So even the couriers are not doing so hot either. Although I didn't guarantee Christmas delivery, please understand that I feel badly that I couldn't make it work. I've been shipping during the holidays every year for the past 20 and I am simply floored how bad things are atm (a customer I shipped on Nov 30th got their order last Friday).

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Timeline
updates.update_content:
Hello Everybody! Things are coming together nicely for us to begin shipping soon. Some of our suppliers are struggling to get us things on time but we are VERY CLOSE to having what we need to start. I anticipate the Christmas Orders will start going out on Friday which means that USA customers *should* receive them in time to wrap them into little bundles of joy. That said, please understand that we will not be able to get orders to customers outside of the USA in time for the holidays. We tried, but things just didn't come in fast enough to make that possible. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience that this may have caused.

updates.update_content:
When I was a kid, a hamburger "Deluxe" meant it came with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickle. I was always excited when my mother allowed me to order one.

updates.update_userinfo: Problem with your survey? No problem!
updates.update_content:
So we've had a few of you reach out with some snags. No worries! Just let us know if the survey treats you like a rag doll. It's easy enough for us to fix. It was very VERY hard to get all the logic to work with all the different pieces, their weights, the add-ons, and international considerations. But we have the power to get you fixed up. So don't panic, just drop us a note and we'll respond as quick as we can. 
In the meantime, to help you stay calm, here is a picture of some kind of animal wrapped in some kind of bread product. I feel like I should know what this is, but I just can't put my finger on it...

By the time you read this I will be launching the "Smoke Test" in BackerKit. This is a mandatory step where 5% of you will receive your surveys. This allows us to make sure it's working properly and if it is, the rest of you will get your surveys shortly after. Fill those out as quick as you can please! We need to make sure we have enough of everything. Which brings me to my next point:
Christmas Question

 LIFETIME ACCESS to 4 Landmark Live Online Events, each packed with CC Club Deck Secrets—and Card Miracles and Methods you can perform with ANY deck. 
 Special CC Club Deck Backers Online Members Portal, where you'll find all of your Out of the Box Recordings—and amazing Bonus Miracles and Training exclusively for our Kickstarter Backers.
 Unprecedented Access to celebrated creators and coaches including Aaron Fisher, Adam Grace, Lee Asher—and world-renowned Special Guests. You'll be able to ask questions, get answers—and even join us onscreen for LIVE coaching to ensure you master your new miracles. 
52 Regular Red-Backed Playing Cards

Timeless Design & Built to Last
Photo by Kier Gomes
Photo by Paul Richardson
 THE STOCK & FINISH 
Aaron Fisher, Adam Grace, and Lee Asher selected every aspect of the CC Club Deck to meet the needs of demanding sleight-of-hand artists, cardists, and collectors.  We wanted to create the ultimate deck for card workers. That's why we spared no expense, and printed on the legendary USPCC WEB PRESS, using a custom formulation of Premium-Casino Crushed Bee Stock, a traditional cut and an air-cushion finish. 
WHAT DOES USING THE BEST PRESS & CASINO CRUSHED BEE STOCK MEAN TO YOU? 
Simply put, there are no words to describe how well these cards handle. These cards shuffle like a dream. The CC Club Deck is light and airy, with a density that makes the cards rest comfortably—but spring quickly into passes, palms and double-lifts. And for card workers, here's the best news of all: no matter that you put these cards through in training or performance, they snap back into shape time and time again.
Photo by Paul Richardson

 THE DESIGN: Backs, Faces, Aces & Joker  
Photo by Paul Richardson
 The Faces 
Our goal at all times was to great a distinctive deck that promotes  Powerful Card Magic above all else. With the exception of the Ace of Spades and Jokers, we chose to emphasize clarity and contrast. Classic faces ensure your audience can experience every moment of your magic in high definition—like watching card magic in a 'lossless' format.
 The Backs
Photo by Kier Gomes
From Aaron Fisher, on discovering the 1907 USPCC 808 Model II Back Design:
Recently, Lee Asher showed Adam Grace and I a full collection of USPCC 808 back designs, We realized that apart from two or three designs, we'd never even seen most of them.  That made us feel like kids again—and it was a GOOD feeling. 
We had been looking for a distinctive, elegant design that would highlight great magic.  When we saw the rare 808 Model II Back Design from 1907, we knew in an instant we'd found 'the one'. We said, "This is it. This design deserves to be SEEN. People who like cards will LOVE this design.  

 Note for Collectors: When the United States Playing Card Company was purchased by Cartamundi, the company stopped granting licenses for their classic artwork. Even so, the CC Club Deck was printed by USPCC with full permission to use USPCC back designs, the Ace of Spades, the Joker, and the Box for our CC Club Deck.
Photo by Paul Richardson
 THE JOKERS 
Photo by Amanda Grace
Photo by Kier Gomes
This incredible image was first published by the United States Playing Card Company in 1894—where it commemorated the playing card competition at the 1878 Worlds Fair Exhibition. This was a landmark event in the history of playing card history. 
The image of the king riding the bicycle, and the book on which it appeared, has been the envy of antique card collectors everywhere. Best of all, the graphic has NEVER been used as an actual 'Joker' before now. 
 ACE OF SPADES 
Photo by Kier Gomes
Our elegant Ace of Spades features a stalk of wheat and comes from a rare Whist design produced by USPCC in the 1920s. This timeless choice emphasizes the organic nature of living communities—like the communities you find on Kickstarter and CC Club. 
Photo by Amanda Grace
Photo by Paul Richardson
STRANGER JOKER & RED/BLUE DOUBLE BACKER:
Photo by Amanda Grace
Our 2020 CC Club Deck was designed from the start with the exacting specifications of expert card magicians in mind.

This is the Daily Carry Custom Configuration, and as you'll see in the Out of the Box Experience Live Events—it puts a world of miracles at your fingertips. 
Photo by Paul Richardson

Yes, if you look close you can see this subtle feature built right into the back design.
Magicians know why a very subtle one-way design will allow you to adapt the hundreds of effects that have been published on the one-way principle. We included this just for you!
Can you spot it? Hint: We'll show you EXACTLY  how to use this devastating and subtle feature to amaze everyone you know!

1. This is our first Kickstarter card project. However, we’ve released many other magic-related projects before—including premium Live Online Events—and we have a solid reputation for delivering great results and customer service.

2. We have a proven track record in regards to production, fulfillment, live online events—and customer support issues in real-time.

campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our CC Club Deck is printed on the highest grade, most durable card stock available. 'Bee' card stock yields the longest-lasting playing cards available. We wanted cards that stay in good working order for much longer than other decks.
Reusability and recyclability
The United States Playing Card Company doesn't send waste to a landfill. The waste product of the card production process is shredded baled and recycled to become tissue or toilet paper.
Sustainable materials
Out of the many kinds of playing cards on Kickstarter, the large majority are printed on thin paper stock. Central to the core mission of the CC Club Deck is the idea that the most durable, Casino Grade cards last the longest. That's why we pay a large premium to use the most durable card stock available.
Environmentally friendly factories
We chose the United States Playing Card Company, in part because it's twice been recognized by the state of Kentucky for energy conservation and recycling efforts in an otherwise wasteful industry.
Sustainable Distribution
Years ago, we made a decision to get rid of print and printed media for all our training materials. The CC Club Deck Project involves 15-20 hours of instruction, all of which will be created, stored, and delivered digitally. We do not print so much as a single DVD to deliver our products.
Something else
Conjuror Community has been engaged in sustainable meeting practices and green initiatives long before COVID. Our members recycle, not only in their personal lives, but we conscientiously share and recycle our magic materials as a matter of pride and a belief in sustainable meeting practices for the future. For 5 years, our online meetings have conserved every kind of energy, and we find that our online meetings are MORE satisfying than the magic meetings we used to pursue using planes, trains, and automobiles. This is a big reason for our success—and how we've become the fastest growing magic company in the world.

Hello Guys,
This is the TCC Team. Today we are here to show you something really AMAZING.
We have just finished and sent all the TCC PRESENTS Leather Chop Cup Project and Luxury Pad Project. The reactions have been great, and we want to say thank you for all your support and patience.
TCC’s vision is to become one of the most valuable and highly recommended magic companies in the world,  creating and offering products that are affordable and heart-moving.
This is our vision and also philosophy of creating products.
We believe in excellent work to create a better world for the future, especially during this time, where we live in a world full of worry. Magic should make people dream and we hope the quality of TCC PRESENTS products will be an exceptional aid for you to bring magic to this landscape.
Hope you enjoy it.
We are also looking forward to your attention and support.
Follow us on Facebook or INS , or leave your email on our Official Website,  to be the first to know about our projects and its progress.
TCC TEAM.
Here it is, our second Special Stretch Goal for this project! Please refer to  Update #4 for full update.
NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING for these special Add-ons with your existing pledge.
If you only wish to back this items individually, we have also created a new reward tier.
[Reminder: If you already backed this project. Please DO NOT select the individual reward. Or you will lose your current reward. You can add on to your current reward. The instructions see below.
This will be one of the best T-shirts that incorporates a magic effect you have ever seen.
Really cool and very easy to do.
'The Card Pickers'
PLAY

Remember the feeling you had when you first picked up your playing cards off the floor?
When I first saw ‘The Card Pickers’, I recalled the above experience, which brought back awkward memories. Then, as I snapped back to the present, I came to appreciate the art of combining a classical oil painting with modern trends. I saw that the people who were picking up the ears of wheat in the painting were gathering the familiar-looking Bicycle Playing Cards. A perfect blend of history and fantasy.
Except its deep meaning. Believe me, this will be one of the best T-shirts that incorporates a magic effect you have ever seen(really cool and very easy to do).
Most things done by a magician will somehow be tied to a magic effect. You could say that it is a tradition ingrained in us. A ‘beginner's mind’, if you will (i.e. having an attitude of openness when studying a subject just as a beginner in that subject would).
The basic effect that can be performed with ‘The Card Pickers’ is: A card selected and remembered by an audience member. You point to a face-down card in the painting on your t-shirt and tell the audience member that this is the card they are thinking of.
You then remove the card from the painting for the audience member to confirm that it is indeed they card they were thinking of. After that, you return the card back into the painting, face-up! The audience can then confirm that the card is indeed back in the painting.
The effect had a similar feel to the ‘hamburger from signboard" and ‘Rubik’s cube from shirt’ effects. No difficult sleight of hand is required. It is clean, and the audience can examine it at the end.
Furthermore, there is more than one face-up card in the painting. So, you can have more variety when performing your routine.
With the ‘The Card Pickers’ You will receive 112 stickers, which include 56 Seven of Clubs, 52 a full deck of 52 playing cards, and 4 ‘The card you are thinking of’’ cards. Each sticker can be used at least twice, resulting in over 200 performances. Refills can be purchased separately.
You can still feel the ingenuity of the makers ingrained into the fabric, the hot stamping process, the sewing process, and even the packaging.
To summarize the materials used and workmanship:
- 210g heavy cotton fabric.
- Seamless barrel stitching. Pressure creased shoulders.
- Thermosetting ink printing technology gives a sense of realism.
We offer 6 sizes, and the below is the information.
If you need the size to be bigger, please contact us.
For this special Kickstarter campaign, you just need to add-on HK$229 (US$ 28.90) to your existing pledge.
Once the campaign has ended on 24 September 2020, we will send a reward survey to you and you can tell us what you have added on, as well as the size and shipping address details.
 [Reminder: If you already backed this project. Please DO NOT select this reward. Or you will lose your current reward. You can add on to your current reward. The instructions see Update #4 ]
All the best & Stay Safe
TCC TEAM
--------------------------------
Once again, our utmost and sincere thanks for all your love and support.
We love magic, and we like to share our favorite magic with you, and we hope you love them too.
We have prepared TWO (2) add-on for you at a special price for you, with NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING for these special Add-ons with your existing pledge.
If you only wish to back this item individually, we have also created a new reward tier. [Reminder: If you already backed this project. Please DO NOT select this reward. Or you will lose your current reward. You can add on to your current reward. The instructions see Update #3]
Today we want to show you the first one,  it's pure visual effects that break the boundary between reality and fantasy.
We call it 'The Moon' .
'The Moon' by Kiyoshi Satoh（佐藤喜義）
When the boundary is not so clear, when you can't distinguish the reality from fantasy. Inside and outside the mirror, it's the same world.
If you can't tell, does it matter?
—— Westworld
Reality is fantasy. Fantasy is reality.
The legend that is Paul Harris and Tayari Casel published a set of lecture notes in 1979, and in it was fantastic coin routine called ‘Twilight’.  
This is the introduction：  
「Twilight is an unparalleled close-up discovery that transports an innocent half dollar into the twilight zone of its own mirrored reflection. While in this dimension the coin is visibly condensed, dematerialized, recreated, and reproduced-building to the spectacular "Twilight" finale in which the mirror's reflected images are instantly transformed into four genuine half dollars!  Twilight is a close-up masterpiece that destroys an audience's ability to distinguish between illusion and reality. It is unlike any coin effect you've ever seen, read or heard about. Twilight is as close to real magic as you'll ever get! 」  
Fewer and fewer people know of this lecture notes 40 years later. It has gradually become the treasure of a few select coin magic lovers. However, as long as you have seen it, you will surely agree with the high praise this routine has garnered.  
It seems to be as close to what real magic would look like.  
During the past 40 years, Twilight has also evolved through many versions, and just a few months ago, we were fortunate to have encountered the version that is by far the cleanest and most poetic—’The Moon’.     
The Japanese underground magician, Kiyoshi Satoh（佐藤喜義) is now well known amongst China’s magic enthusiasts. We have just published his card magic book ‘No Man Land’ recently, so that our Chinese friends can appreciate the beauty of Mr. Satoh's packet tricks.  ‘The Moon’ is a lesser-known treasured routine of Mr. Satoh. It is a new interpretation of ‘Twilight’. Based on the original effect, Mr. Satoh changed the handling of the whole routine that even makes you totally unaware of the existence of any sleights, and have perfected the entire illusion.  
A mirror, a coin, a fantasy journey.  
The mirror in the routine needs careful handwork that was described in the original lecture notes. To allow everyone use it immediately, we have already made this special mirror in advance and finished the edges to achieve the best feeling. 
When you are performing ’The Moon’, you are not only performing this effect, but also the 40-year evolution history of ‘Twilight’. So, we made a high-grade soft leather bag for the mirror, which is easy to carry and adds a sense of ritual to the routine.  
An expanded shell and a soft performance surface will be used in the routine. Considering that most of people already have an expanded shell, we have decided NOT to include an expanded shell.  
You can learn this legendary effect right out of the box.      
No difficult sleights.  
Pure visual effects that break the boundary between reality and fantasy.
Detailed online instruction.  
Each gimmick mirror is handmade and fully polished. The surrounding edges are smooth and neat, which provides protection allows for smooth sleights.  
Ingenious gimmick design makes your magic more fantastic.  
With the included soft leather case, it is easy to carry, making the routine more ritual, and can fully protect the props and extend its service life.  
With the microfiber mirror cloth, you can clean the mirror anytime and anywhere.  
Contents: A special handmade gimmick mirror + cleaning cloth + soft leather carrying case. [Coins and Expanded Shell are NOT included]

All the best & Stay Safe
